metadata.name: Kharma #1
metadata.description:
Number 5 of this 5 piece collection earns the owner 1 entry into our drawing to come hang out with Kharma at any of our SokuSquad events over the next 12 months. 

Each NFT also gives you EXCLUSIVE ACCESS to her Private Discord group where you can chat with her and get to know her on a more personal level. Besides being a badass racer chick that races bikes, cars and trucks, she's just a great person to get to know. So get yours today before they're all sold out.
